Class Partida

java.lang.Object
CLASES.Partida
public class Partida extends Object
Partida class represents a game of Monopoly. It contains information about the game state, including players, decks, and the game board. It also provides methods for managing turns, drawing the board, and checking for winners.

  • Constructor Details

    • Partida

      public Partida()
      Default constructor initializes the partida with empty values.

    • Partida

      public Partida(int id, Date fecha, Baraja mazoRobo, Baraja mazoDescarte, ArrayList<Jugador> jugadores, ArrayList<Casilla> casillas, int turno)
      Constructor to initialize a Partida with specific values.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for the partida
      fecha - the date of the partida
      mazoRobo - the deck of cards for drawing
      mazoDescarte - the deck of discarded cards
      jugadores - the list of players in the partida
      casillas - the list of board squares in the partida
      turno - the current turn number

    • dibujarTablero

      public void dibujarTablero()
      Method to draw the game board with all the squares and players.

    • comprobarGanador

      public boolean comprobarGanador()
      Method to check if there is a winner in the game. If only one player remains, they are declared the winner.
      Returns:
      true if there is still a winner, false otherwise

    • cambiarTurno

      public void cambiarTurno()
      Method to change the turn to the next player. It increments the turno variable to switch to the next player in the list.

    • turnos

      public void turnos()
      Method to handle the player's turn. It prompts the player to roll the dice, moves them, and applies effects based on the square they land on. It also allows players to perform actions like trading or building houses.

    • intercambiar1

      public void intercambiar1(Jugador jugador1, Jugador jugador2)
      Method to handle the trading of properties between players. It allows players to trade money for a street.
      Parameters:
      jugador1 - the player initiating the trade
      jugador2 - the player receiving the trade offer

    • intercambiar2

      public void intercambiar2(Jugador jugador1, Jugador jugador2)
      Method to handle the trading of properties between players. It allows players to trade a street for money.
      Parameters:
      jugador1 - the player initiating the trade
      jugador2 - the player receiving the trade offer

    • intercambiar3

      public void intercambiar3(Jugador jugador1, Jugador jugador2)
      Method to handle the trading of properties between players. It allows players to trade a street for another street.
      Parameters:
      jugador1 - the player initiating the trade
      jugador2 - the player receiving the trade offer

    • tirarDado

      public int tirarDado()
      Method to simulate rolling a dice. It generates a random number between 1 and 6 (inclusive).
      Returns:
      the result of the dice roll

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Partida object.
